name: Coconut Loaf
author: stikychikn
summary: This is a tasty coconut quick bread made in a loaf tin. When cold it is sliced and served with butter. You will get many slices, depending on how thick or thin you want them.
ingredients: 1 cup castor sugar or superfine sugar
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a medium bowl, stir together the coconut, sugar, and self-rising flour
Stir in the milk, just until everything is moistened
Spoon into a greased 8x4 inch loaf pan
Bake for 45 minutes in the preheated oven, until a toothpick inserted into the crown of the loaf comes out clean
